page.title: 06LANGUAGE AND RELIGION.
page.content: Our class questioned two hundred people in our survey and we found out that 16% could speak Welsh and that 25% of the rest understood Welsh.12 people could speak French,4 could speak German 2 Spanish and 1 Esperanto.24% belonged to the Church in Wales,4% to the Catholic Church,6% were non-conformists and 14% belonged to other Churches.25% said that they did not belong to any Church.The rest of the people questioned gave no answer.A Welsh speaking Congregational minister told us that he had 200 members at his chapel.In the new houses at Traeth Melyn,fewer people were members of a church.
